As a doorstop: Place a dumbbell at the bottom of a door to prevent it from swinging open, ensuring safety and stability.
As a bookend: A dumbbell can be used to hold books upright on a shelf, providing an unconventional yet effective solution.
As a paperweight: A dumbbell can be used to hold down papers on a desk, adding a touch of style and functionality.
As a plant holder: A dumbbell can be used to hold plants in a small space, providing a unique and eco-friendly way to display greenery.
As a weight for exercise: A dumbbell can be used for various exercises, such as bicep curls, tricep extensions, and shoulder presses, providing a convenient and portable workout tool.
